changes.note: Properly export the executable binary
Dependencies updated
Add support for solidity 0.4.23
Add support for solidity 0.4.22
Changed the config key `web3Provider` to `provider` to be consistent with other tools
Don't try to write contract artifact if an error occured
Create solc_bin directory if does not exist before attempting to compile
Add TS types for `yargs`
Add support for Solidity 0.4.20 and 0.4.21
Replace `jsonrpcPort` config with `jsonrpcUrl`
Replace `jsonrpc-port` CLI option with `jsonrpc-url`
Export the `Compiler`
Load solc from remote source instead of having it locally
Add `bytecode`, `runtime_bytecode`, `source_map`, `source_map_runtime` and `sources` fields to artifacts
Remove 0x-specific `migrate` command
Allow deployer to accept a provider instead of port and host. This makes it possible to run it with in-process ganache-core
Consolidate all `console.log` calls into `logUtils` in the `@0xproject/utils` package
Add `#!/usr/bin/env node` pragma above `cli.ts` script to fix command-line error.
Check dependencies when determining if contracts should be recompiled
Improve an error message for when deployer is supplied with an incorrect number of constructor arguments
Add the ability to pass in specific contracts to compile in CLI
Fix publishing issue where .npmignore was not properly excluding undesired content
